DoC’s warning after kids attack protected oystercatcher chicks at Mangawhai https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/docs-warning-after-kids-attack-protected-oystercatcher-chicks-at-mangawhai/OUZHDLRRE5EK7BG53FQOJV6TD4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/docs-warning-after-kids-attack-protected-oystercatcher-chicks-at-mangawhai/OUZHDLRRE5EK7BG53FQOJV6TD4/ Mike DinsdaleVariable oystercatchers have been protected since 1922. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 02:30:00 +0000 The Department of Conservation is warning people that there are hefty penalties for disturbing protected wildlife, like oystercatchers, after three children kicked two oystercatcher chicks at Mangawhai last month.
